description: This source file defines a UI component named 'Button' using the LightningJS framework. It specifies its template, state, and input handling for toggling the 'favorited' state.

classes.name: Button
classes.description: A UI component representing a button that toggles its 'favorited' state and updates displayed text accordingly.

methods.name: state
methods.description: Initializes the component's state with 'isFavorited', 'favoriteText', and 'unfavoriteText'.

methods.name: input.enter
methods.description: Handles the 'enter' input event, toggling the 'isFavorited' state.
